pylayers.signal.bsignal.FUsignal.ift¶

FUsignal.ift(Nz=1, ffts=0)[source]¶
return the associated TUsignal
Parameters :

Nz : Number of zeros (-1) No forcing

ffts : 0 (no fftshift 1:fftshift)

>>> e = EnImpulse() :

>>> E = e.fft() :

>>> EU = E.unrex() :
